name: Fun Word Puzzle 2020

You need to guess the right word by selecting different alphabets separately. On each wrong selection, a part of your imaginary player will sketch. If you fail to guess right word? To give you an actual gameplay of writing words and sketching hangman on paper, we have designed this word puzzle games 2020 with 2 players. As classic hangman words guessing games, it is suggested to use vowel letters first as they are commonly used in most words of all hangman free games.  Features - Extreme addictive gameplay of fun word puzzle games. - Suitable for players of all ages like kids, adults and all senior players. - 10 categories to challenge your brain: Actor, Animal, Brand, Country, Film, Food, Fruit & Vegetables, Professions, Sports and Verbs.  - 700 interesting levels of hangman word. - Cool and fun gameplay of best classic hangman game. - Colorful and eye-catching graphics. - 2 player mode to play as hangman multiplayer. - Exciting word complete levels of best word games. - Leaderboard to defeat senior players of hangman word puzzle.
